Note: CREST has broad scope; clarify relevance to social engineering. Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [insert full list above]. - Active Learning Hooks: Embed mini-discussion/peer-teach/problem-solve in explanations. - Scaffolding: Distribute cards across 4 layers [insert full scaffolding above]; tag each. - Research: CREST = Council for Registered Ethical Security Testers; certs: CCT, CRT, CPSA; aligns ISO 27001/GDPR; Best Practices: Expertise (3+ years pen testing); Sources: safetechinnovations.com, op-c.net. - Voter Consensus: 100% approval; complete best practices; comparisons (CREST vs OSCP/CEH); link prior knowledge. High-quality, distractors plausible, explanations 50-100 words.
